name: AI Statistical_Arbitrage Strategy
description: AI-generated statistical_arbitrage strategy for SPY, QQQ
entry_logic:
def should_enter(symbol, context):
    """Check if strategy should enter position"""
    current_price = context.current_price.price if context.current_price else 0

    # Entry conditions
    price_ok = current_price <= 0
    volume_ok = context.current_price.volume >= 0 if context.current_price else True

    return price_ok and volume_ok
exit_logic:
def should_exit(position, current_price, entry_price, hold_time):
    """Check if strategy should exit position"""
    profit_pct = (current_price - entry_price) / entry_price

    # Exit conditions
    profit_target_hit = profit_pct >= 0.015
    stop_loss_hit = profit_pct <= -0.005
    time_expired = hold_time >= 3600

    return profit_target_hit or stop_loss_hit or time_expired
